INJEOLMI

Injeolmi is a type of Korean rice cake that is made from steamed rice flour and coated in a sweet bean powder.

1-2 servings 15 minutes
THIS IS AN ADVERT

Equipment

  • Steamer
  • Bowl
  • Spoon

Ingredients

  • Steamed rice flour
  • Sweet bean powder
  • Water
  • Sugar
  • Salt

Directions

  1. Combine the rice flour, sweet bean powder, water, sugar, and salt in a bowl and mix well.
  2. Place the mixture in a steamer and steam for 15 minutes.
  3. Remove the injeolmi from the steamer and let it cool.
  4. Serve and enjoy!
